title: RA Sushi offers tempura options including shrimp, calamari and vegetables
statement: RA Sushi serves tempura that is lightly battered and comes in colossal shrimp, shrimp, calamari, and vegetable varieties.

citations.quote: TEMPURA Lightly battered and served with tempura sauce. Your choice of: Colossal shrimp Shrimp Calamari Vegetable
